snippet: The former head of the domestic security apparatus is the first member of the Politburo Standing Committee, retired or active, to face a criminal corruption inquiry.
abstract: China expels Zhou Yongkang, former head of country's domestic security, from Communist Party and arrests him; charges include taking bribes, helping family members and cronies plunder government assets and leaking official secrets; he is first member of Politburo Standing Committee to face inquiry on criminal corruption.
lead_paragraph: The former head of the domestic security apparatus is the first member of the Politburo Standing Committee, retired or active, to face a criminal corruption inquiry.

headline.main: China Arrests Ex-Chief of Domestic Security in Graft Case
headline.print_headline: China Arrests Ex-Chief of Domestic Security in Graft Case

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
